title: summon 怪物蛋 计分板
author: 840196733mw
txt_content: summon一只僵尸，在胸甲的位置有一个石按钮，死后百分百掉落，创建一个计分板，名叫summonboss，把刚才的僵尸设置为一分

replies.author: 握地师兄
replies.txt_content:
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {Equipment:[{},{},{},{id:minecraft:stone_button,Count:1,tag:{}},{}],CustomName:"summonboss",DropChances:[0F,0F,0F,1F,0F]}   召唤僵尸

/scoreboard objectives add summonboss dummy 创建计分板

高频/scoreboard players set @e[type=Zombie,name=summonboss] summonboss 1    设置分数

replies.author: scorpio975
replies.txt_content:
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {Equipment:[{},{},{},{id:minecraft:stone_button,Count:1},{}],CustomName:"A",DropChances:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F,1.0F,0.0F]}复制代码
召唤一只名字叫做A(可以改，这样在计分板中容易控制)的僵尸，胸甲是石质按钮(估计显示不出来)，掉落率100%
/scoreboard objectives add summonboss dummy复制代码
创建名为summonboss的dummy计分板
/scoreboard players set @e[type=Zombie,name=A] summonboss 1复制代码
把名为A的僵尸的summonboss计分板设为1

replies.author: 840196733mw
replies.txt_content:
握地师兄 发表于 2015-10-10 20:32
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {Equipment:[{},{},{},{id:minecraft:stone_button,Count:1,tag:{}},{}],CustomName ...
不用名字加分可以吗？我要的是只要穿了一件拉杆在胸甲位置就加分

replies.author: 握地师兄
replies.txt_content:
840196733mw 发表于 2015-10-10 20:35
不用名字加分可以吗？我要的是只要穿了一件拉杆在胸甲位置就加分
可以，那设置分数的计分板就改为
/scoreboard players set @e[type=Zombie,name=summonboss] summonboss 1 {Equipment:[{},{},{},{id:minecraft:lever,Count:1,tag:{}},{}]}

不过我上面回答的那个是戴石制按钮的，这个是拉杆的，如果想要按钮的只要把里面的lever改成stone_button就行了

1.9需要把第一个改一下
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {ArmorItems:[{},{},{id:minecraft:stone_button,Count:1},{}],CustomName:"A",ArmorDropChances:[0.0F,0.0F,1.0F,0.0F]}复制代码

replies.author: scorpio975
replies.txt_content:
scorpio975 发表于 2015-10-11 11:26
1.9需要把第一个改一下
如果不想用名字区分加不加分的话可以用
/scoreboard players set @e[type=Zombie] summonboss 1 {ArmorItems:[{},{},{id:minecraft:stone_button,Count:1},{}]}复制代码

replies.author: 840196733mw
replies.txt_content:
